sys_sg_write_back_action_item.name: New (Dashboard)
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.template: active={{Dashboard active}}^breakdown_source={{Dashboard breakdown_source}}^color={{Dashboard color}}^disable_multiple_element={{Dashboard disable_multiple_element}}^group={{Dashboard group}}^groups={{Dashboard groups}}^is_breakdown={{Dashboard is_breakdown}}^managed_breakdown={{Dashboard managed_breakdown}}^managed_publisher={{Dashboard managed_publisher}}^name={{Dashboard name}}^no_tabs={{Dashboard no_tabs}}^order={{Dashboard order}}^owner={{Dashboard owner}}^restrict_to_roles={{Dashboard restrict_to_roles}}^role_override={{Dashboard role_override}}^EQ
